borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Erection of a rear extension at second floor level over part of the existing back addition, following demolition of the chimney; erection of a single storey side infill extension, following the demolition of side bay window and rear timber garden access door; demolition of external store to the rear of existing back addition at ground and first floor level; installation of a rooflight on top of the main flat roof at roof level; installation of a rooflight to the side roofslope of main front roof; erection of a dormer door to the rear of existing rear roof extension, comprising of sliding doors and a Juliette balcony; replacement of all existing single glazed timber framed windows with new double glazed timber framed windows; bricking up 1no. window to the side elevation at first floor level; erection of a replacement brick built bin store with timber doors to the front garden; alterations to the rear elevation at ground floor level to including installation of double glazed aluminium framed sliding doors following the removal of existing doors; erection of a glass balustrade around the perimeter of proposed rear lightwell landscaping of the front and rear gardens; excavation of part of the front and rear gardens to form lightwells, in connection with the enlargement and lowering of existing basement; alterations to the existing front lightwell to include installation of new enlarged double glazed timber framed double doors with window panels; installation of an air conditioning unit within an acoustic enclosure to the front lightwell at basement floor level.
decision_conditions: Anti-vibration mounts and silencing of m
